> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder was taken back by Legacy's knowledge o=
f him but decides
> to dismiss it for now.
> 
> Elder: I realize t=
hat. We owe you a great bit of gratitude. 
> The Minions had attacked th=
e Maximal city of Atlantis and cause 
> much destruction. They even stol=
e the greatest power we can know 
> from us. We have come to try and rec=
apture some of that power.
> 
> Elder was being vague on purpose.
&gt=
; 
> Elder: May I ask of your origin? I am quite surprised to find a 
&g=
t; Transformer guarding the Ark in this era.
 
The large robot falls s=
ilent for a moment as if it thought it heard something. Its singular optic =
blinked and flickered as its head craned around . . . 
 
> Nighstri=
ke had arrived and tried to cover himself and watch the 
> escene, tryin=
g not to be discovered at same time
 
Finally it stopped as it returne=
d its formidable gaze on Lord Elder, =93I AM CALLED LEGACY.=94 He stated si=
mply as he walked calmly over to Elder=92s position. =93I HAVE BEEN SE=
NT HERE WITH A SINGULAR MISSION - ONE OF UTMOST IMPORTANCE.=94 
 
Lega=
cy stopped a few meters from Elder as he folded his arms behind his back, =
=93IN THE REALM FROM WHICH I COME, THE MAXIMALS DID NOT ARRIVE IN=
 TIME TO STOP THE MINIONS, AND THAT FAILURE SET OFF A CATACLYSMIC CHAIN OF =
EVENTS OF WHICH THE FULL PERMUTATIONS HAVE YET TO BE REALIZED. I HAVE BEEN =
SENT TO RECITFY THAT OUTCOME, AND TO WARN YOU OF THE POSSIBILITIES YET TO H=
APPEN.=94
 
Legacy looked around as something was tripping his sensors=
 . . . 
 
Preston
(Legacy)
